message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $20,000.  I believe it offers significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $20,000 is significantly higher than its value to you. How about we meet halfway at $16,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe that $12,000 is a fair price for this product. I hope we can reach an agreement at that price.
